the dark side

28 Apr 2005

Well, it appears I was the last person to find PostSecret so here's a new link for your amusement...

The Darth Side: Memoirs of a Monster

That's Darth Vader's own blog (allegedly not a marketing ploy, and it is very amusing). The comments on the site are funny too.

"Apr 25 -- James Earl Jones is still doing insulting impressions of me at cocktail parties for cheap laughs; the prostitutes he flirts with think it's "cute"."
